This is awesome! But ti's too big! I would suggest breaking this up into parts, but I can't grab all 67 gigs all at once so I'm just grabbing the A's right now. Just a thought - thx so much for sharing a killer collection!
One more thought - at 67 gigs, how many folks will be able to seed that? Don't get me wrong, this is awesome and I hope that everyone will get a chance to enjoy it.

The RAR files are split by letter. If you're looking to some useable data quickly, download a letter like S or E.

In hindsight I probably should have made individual RARs instead of split archives.

If anyone has 200KB/s+ upload and would be willing to seed this for a few weeks, I'd be happy to burn this on a bunch of DVDs and mail them out to someone. Just email me on zirc0n@bigfoot.com if you're interested. Don't email me if you're just going to take the data and not seed it.
I would be able to help and upload for you up to 500 GB if i had the files to do so......
Email me and let me know the address to ship the DVDs to. I'll burn them tomorrow.
I tried to email you and it came back as delivery failure....are you sure you type the correct email? Send me a message at Romeoluv2539 @ gmail dot.com

I'm working on web-seeding some of this. Please add http://rule34.20x.cc/torrents to your web seeds list.

In uTorrent, you can do this by going into the torrent properties, clicking the Advanced tab, and pasting the URL into the box.
